option.kateroo.noLavaFog.tooltip: Removes lava fog when the camera is submerged in lava.
option.kateroo.disableBlockBreakingParti: Disables block breaking particles when breaking blocks.
option.kateroo.disableCameraMovementWhen: Disables camera movement when taking damage.
option.kateroo.disableFireOnCam.tooltip: Disables fire overlay when the player is on fire.
option.kateroo.miningRewardDrops.tooltip: Each 30k blocks mined, you will receive a reward.
